mapper.select: select i.ingredient_eng as ingredient, i.ingredient_kor as ingredientkor, b.brandname as brandname, p.company_name as company from Brandname b join Ingredient i on b.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id join Pharma_Ceutical_Company p on b.pcc_id = p.pcc_id where b.ingredient_id in (select ingredient_id from Ingredient where ingredient_efficacy like CONCAT('%', #{efficacy}, '%')) and b.ingredient_id not in (select ingredient_id from Connect where tki_id = (select tki_id from TKI where TKI_eng like CONCAT('%', #{tki}, '%') or TKI_kor like CONCAT('%', #{tki}, '%') or TKI_product_kor like CONCAT('%', #{tki}, '%')) and TKIDDI_id = 'tkiddi_01');
